headline: IQVIA Launches New AI Agents for Life Sciences and Healthcare
summary: RESEARCH TRIANGLE PARK, N.C., June 11, 2025--IQVIA (NYSE:IQV), a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence to the life sciences and healthcare industries, unveils AI agents at GTC Paris. IQVIA’s new custom-built AI agents using NVIDIA technology are designed to enhance workflows and accelerate insights for life sciences. These live applications of agentic architectures illustrate how IQVIA AI and deep domain expertise are transforming
